name: Gymnastick
description:
A FALLING STICK SIMULATOR
Can you swing & flip your way through 50 levels using only two buttons?

*** No ads or in-app purchases
*** Perfect for short breaks
*** Extreme battery life

HOW TO PLAY?
You control a stick that falls from the sky. Using only gravity and your ability pin either end in place, you have to guide it safely through the challenges. Good luck.

THE BEST KIND OF MOBILE GAME
Gymnastick is super easy to learn but hard to master. You'll be doing precise flips in no time, but the levels will demand more and more.

PERFECT ON THE GO
Play for a minute or play for an hour. Gymnastick is great for short breaks. Play on the bus. Play while waiting for your burger. Play in the bathroo... any room you like. No internet connection required!

PAY ONCE AND PLAY
No in-app purchases. No ads. No microtransactions. This is mobile gaming like it should be.

FULL CHARGE
Gymnastick is ridiculously cheap on your battery. You can play as much as you want without worries.
